title: Calories in Half a Banana
meta_description: Discover calories in half a banana, including carbs, fiber, sugars, protein, fat, and full nutrition breakdown for easy tracking.
assumptions: Medium banana (~118 g whole, ~100 g peeled); ripe, peeled, no added toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by banana size, ripeness, variety, and storage; values are averages. Check for allergies or specifics.

quick_answer.text: Half a medium banana provides ~52 kcal, 14 g carbs, and 1.6 g fiber.

faqs.q: How many calories in half a banana?
faqs.a: About 52 kcal for half a medium banana.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in half a banana?
faqs.a: Roughly 13.5 g carbs, including 1.6 g fiber and 7.2 g sugars.
